kv4.1:1.7: Hañci natthi arahato gihisaṁyojanaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.1:2.3: Nanu arahato gihisaṁyojanaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammanti?
kv4.1:2.5: Hañci arahato gihisaṁyojanaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.1:3.3: Atthi koci gihī gihisaṁyojanaṁ appahāya diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaroti?
kv4.1:3.5: Hañci natthi koci gihī gihisaṁyojanaṁ appahāya diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.1:4.4: “atthi nu kho, bho gotama, koci gihī gihisaṁyojanaṁ appahāya kāyassa bhedā dukkhassantakaro”ti?
kv4.1:4.5: “Natthi kho, vaccha, koci gihī gihisaṁyojanaṁ appahāya kāyassa bhedā dukkhassantakaro”ti.
kv4.1:5.3: Arahā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya, methunaṁ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṁ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṁ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṁ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṁ sādiyeyya, ajeḷakaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, cittavaṇḍavālamoḷiṁ dhāreyya, odātāni vatthāni dīghadasāni dhāreyya, yāvajīvaṁ agāriyabhūto assāti?
kv4.1:6.4: Nanu yaso kulaputto, uttiyo gahapati, setu māṇavo, gihibyañjanena arahattaṁ pattoti?
kv4.1:6.6: Hañci yaso kulaputto, uttiyo gahapati, setu māṇavo, gihibyañjanena arahattaṁ patto, tena vata re vattabbe—
